translation.privacy_cancelled_content:
You need to agree to the Privacy Policy in order to use the services of this application

The Application will use and disclose your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy. Click the button below to view the detailed privacy policy.
translation.privacy_html_summary:
Privacy Policy

The Application respects and protects the personal privacy of all users of the Service. In order to provide you with a more accurate service, the Application will use and disclose your personal information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Click the button below to view the detailed privacy policy.
translation.privacy_disagree_confirm_android: Disagree？ please click "Disagree" button twice to exit~~
translation.unable_connect_to_server: Couldn't connect to server, please retry after network is OK
translation.makesure_network_and_latest_version: Please make sure network is OK, and upgraded to latest version
translation.check_network: Network is down，or make sure app can use network
translation.server_upgrading: The server is upgrading，please retry after 10 more seconds.
translation.check_client_version: Please upgrade app to latest version

translation.privacy_cancelled_content:
您需要同意隐私策略，才能使用本应用的服务

本应用会按照本隐私权政策的规定使用和披露您的个人信息。点击下面的按钮查看详细的隐私政策。
translation.privacy_html_summary:
隐私政策

本应用尊重并保护所有使用服务用户的个人隐私权。为了给您提供更准确的服务，本应用会按照本隐私权政策的规定使用和披露您的个人信息。点击下面的按钮查看详细的隐私政策。
translation.privacy_disagree_confirm: 是不是，点错了？ 请自行退出APP~~
translation.privacy_disagree_confirm_android: 是不是，点错了？ 请再点击“不同意”两次确认退出~~
translation.unable_connect_to_server: 能连接到服务器! 请确保网络连通后，再尝试
translation.makesure_network_and_latest_version: 请确保网络通畅，并使用App的最新版本
translation.nomore_ads: 广告都被抢光了，请稍微尝试。多点击广告才能有更多广告！
translation.check_network: 无法进行网络连接，请检查网络状况，或者给App连接网络的权限
translation.server_upgrading: 服务器可能正在升级，请10秒后重试
translation.check_client_version: 请检查App版本，确保已经是最新的版本了
translation.problem_recovering: 发现了问题，努力自救中·····
